channel.title: Ronin-time-bureaucrats on Space·Time Will Tell
channel.description: Recent content in Ronin-time-bureaucrats on Space·Time Will Tell

item.title: Introducing the Space·Time Deck
item.description: The Space·Time Deck is a card deck designed to be used as an improv tool, both for storytelling and role-playing games. We will be posting more about this deck in future posts. Note that the oddly large margins are there by design. We’ll try and offer this deck for on-demand printing, and such margins are required by printers.

item.title: Ronin Time Bureaucrats: Is there an afterlife?
item.description:
Is there an afterlife?

Why, of course, there is, and you came to the right place!

item.title: Ronin Time Bureaucrats
item.description: « Nobody remembers with certainty in which year the Great Snafu took place, but people generally agree that it was on a September, or perhaps on a Saturday afternoon, on some even-numbered millenium. Also, it involved blowing up the Universe, which made pretty much everybody unhappy, except for a few people who had been waiting for this opportunity to loudly exclaim “I told you so”, and even they were not happy for long.
